nodes.text: Straugh was the name of a giant Grophet living on the Horizon Island of Rishi until 3637 BBY, when he was killed.

Straugh the Grophet appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. Killing him and two other grophets is required to access a set of datacrons on Rishi.
